allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: initial commit - Mythic Snake roguelike game

Complete implementation of HTML5 Canvas snake game with:
- Wave-based enemy spawning system
- Boss battles \(5 types: Hydra, Demon, Titan, Thor, Chaos Lord\)
- Equipment system \(weapons, accessories, collectibles\)
- Organ evolution mechanic
- Weather/disaster systems with particle effects
- Day/night cycles and seasons
- localStorage save system \(3 slots\)
- Full UI with inventory, leaderboard, achievements

Technical details:
- Vanilla JavaScript ES6+ with class-based architecture
- System-based game architecture pattern
- RequestAnimationFrame game loop
- Canvas rendering with particle effects
- No external dependencies

Docs: README.md, CLAUDE.md for development guide
EOF
\)")
